title: ET60019: Knowledge Modelling And Semantic Technologies - Quick Facts

page: ET60019: Knowledge Modelling And Semantic Technologies

title: Syllabus
text:
Introduction | The web, semantics, semantics and the web, History, pointers to resources/use cases etc., Semantic web vision, semantic web architecture, Layer cake
Knowledge Representation | Semantic net. Frames, proposition logic, first order logic
Resource Description Framework | RDF, RDFS, SPARQL, DBpedia, RDF Store, Web of Data
Ontology Engineering | OWL, Description Logic, RIF, Reasoning, Web scale reasoning, Protégé, Ontology engineering models, ontology mapping, ontology learning
Linked Data | Linked data concepts, Principles, Design considerations, publishing linked data, consuming linked data
Processing Information Network | Homogeneous Information Networks, Heterogeneous Information Network, Information network Mining
page: ET60019: Knowledge Modelling And Semantic Technologies
